My Account Technology Furniture Ink & Toner Paper Office Supplies
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
As we bring together the very best of OfficeMax® and Office Depot®, our commitment to you, our valued customer, is stronger than ever. We know your business, and we’re still the company you’ve partnered with for years.
Your seamless transition to the Office Depot platform will provide your business with broader capabilities, greater flexibility and more choices — with no disruption to your organization. You’ll now have access to our award-winning website business.officedepot.com, plus a variety of tools specifically designed to simplify your day-to-day operations, streamline your ordering process, and improve your overall experience:
Engaging and informative product photos, videos and customer reviews let you browse, research and purchase with confidence.
Interactive dashboard and at-a-glance reporting will help you track and manage your purchasing activity.
Select cart — suggests alternate products that can help you save more and lets you identify end-users that could be selecting less expensive products
Quality Office Depot® brands — cost-effective, quality-tested products that are designed to perform just as well as the national brands. Or even better.
Best-in-class pricing strategies, including web based pricing — We create pricing offers that are transparent, simple to gauge for competitiveness and easy to understand so you can shop with confidence.
Convenient multi-channel ordering — online at business.officedepot.com, In store at any Office Depot® or OfficeMax® location, or on the go with our simple-to-use business mobile app
Now you can buy online and pick up in store in 1 hour*
275,000+ technology products to choose from
Award-winning Office Depot® GreenerOffice™ program
Again, we appreciate your business. If there’s anything you need, don’t hesitate to reach out to me personally and I’ll work with you to make it right. That’s what “making business personal” is all about.
Sincerely, {!User.Name}
